unnormalised: **EdTech Update: Scholarship Portals - Your Ticket to Chai and Studies!**
normalised: **EdTech Update: Scholarship Portals - Your Ticket to Chai and Studies!**

unnormalised: Hey future IITians and Doctors! Feeling the pinch of tuition fees? Don't let Rs. 2 lakhs plus deter you! New scholarship portals are popping up faster than pani puri stalls on Linking Road.
normalised: Hey future I I Tians and Doctors! Feeling the pinch of tuition fees? Don't let rupees two lakhs plus deter you! New scholarship portals are popping up faster than pani puri stalls on Linking Road.

unnormalised: Think of them as Tinder, but for funding your education. Seriously, match with the perfect scholarship for that B.Tech dream or your MBBS ambitions. These sites are making it way easier to find opportunities, whether you're aiming for AIIMS Delhi or a local college.
normalised: Think of them as Tinder, but for funding your education. Seriously, match with the perfect scholarship for that B Tech dream or your M B B S ambitions. These sites are making it way easier to find opportunities, whether you're aiming for A I I M S Delhi or a local college.

unnormalised: Dr. Sharma from JNU says these portals level the playing field, helping students from smaller towns like Varanasi get a shot at top-notch education. Many also have resources like essay-writing tips and interview prep, taking you from zero to hero in no time. Imagine, that coding bootcamp costing 50,000 can now be a reality!
normalised: Doctor Sharma from J N U says these portals level the playing field, helping students from smaller towns like Varanasi get a shot at top-notch education. Many also have resources like essay-writing tips and interview prep, taking you from zero to hero in no time. Imagine, that coding bootcamp costing fifty thousand can now be a reality!

unnormalised: So, ditch the Netflix binge and spend a few hours exploring these digital treasure troves. You might just find the golden ticket to your dream career and a fancy degree to hang up on your wall (in your 200 sq ft Mumbai flat, maybe!). Happy hunting!
normalised: So, ditch the Netflix binge and spend a few hours exploring these digital treasure troves. You might just find the golden ticket to your dream career and a fancy degree to hang up on your wall (in your two hundred square feet Mumbai flat, maybe!). Happy hunting!
